headline: GOP Rep. Warren Davidson: Biden Admin Is Not Treating Drug Cartels Like the ‘Enemy of Our Country’
sentences: The market is controlled by the cartels on the street, but China is sending the precursor chemicals into Mexico, Mexico’s whipping this up into batches of fentanyl, and we really need to get a handle on the importation of the precursor chemicals that are helping poison our fellow Americans."
I mean, we should be collecting intelligence on the cartels like we do any other enemy of our country, North Korea, Iran or anything else.
People don’t necessarily realize, particularly young people, that these drugs are actively being poisoned.

EXCERPT:
DAVIDSON: "Well, I mean, they didn’t accidentally develop these policies.
And unfortunately, we’re not treating the cartels as true enemies of our country.
And the other issue is China sells the precursor chemicals to the cartels.
They’re killing more Americans than these other countries are right now.
And look, I get that people are buying the drugs.
